text: Jane Arliss Sturgulewski (n√©e Wright; September 27, 1927 - April 7, 2022) was an American Republican politician and businesswoman. She was born in Ferndale, Washington. Sturgulewski was a member of the Alaska Senate from 1979 until 1993. She was the unsuccessful Republican nominee for Governor of Alaska two times in 1986 and 1990. Sturgulewski was hospitalized on April 5, 2022 in Anchorage, Alaska. She died two days later, aged 94.Trailblazing Alaska politician Arliss Sturgulewski dies at 94 ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Washington (state) Category:Politicians from Washington (state) Category:Politicians from Anchorage, Alaska Category:Businesspeople from Anchorage, Alaska Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Disease-related deaths in Alaska
title: Arliss Sturgulewski
